hero.title: About Me
hero.description: Learn more about my journey, experience, and what motivates me as a developer.

profile.name: Rafael Pereira
profile.title: Fullstack Developer
profile.bio1: I am a fullstack developer with 5 years of experience and a journey that began from the early days of Dimensão Sistemas, where I continue to contribute with maintenance and innovations. During this time, I have participated in all layers of development, which has given me a broad and practical view of the process as a whole.
profile.bio2: In 2019, I started my education with a technical course in Systems Development and, after completing it, I continued with a technology degree in Systems Analysis and Development. Since then, I have been deepening my knowledge with practical courses at balta.io, Alura, and research in documentation. Throughout the journey, I have built a solid foundation in the main areas of development, because I believe that understanding the whole is essential to create complete and efficient solutions.
profile.bio3: Despite my fullstack profile, it's in the front-end where I feel most at home. I enjoy creating beautiful, innovative, responsive, and user-centered interfaces, always with a mobile-first focus. Lately, I have been studying tools like Figma, Framer, and Adobe XD to bring design even closer and deliver experiences that really make sense for users.

description.0: I started my journey as an intern and had access to various courses offered by the company, which was essential for my initial foundation.
description.1: As I progressed through the content, I went through internal evaluations that helped measure my progress and prepare for the real challenges of the team.
description.2: In the fourth month, I began to actually work on the company's demands, putting into practice everything I had been studying.
description.3: I closely followed my technical supervisor, absorbing knowledge in code reviews and understanding the importance of details.
description.4: Gradually, I took on specific parts of the development of the company's institutional website. I made many mistakes, but I learned even more from each challenge.

description.0: After demonstrating evolution and commitment during the internship, I was hired as a Junior Developer and started to take on greater responsibilities within the company's projects.
description.1: I started with the complex implementation of an intelligent search bar in the actions menu.
description.2: Today I develop and perform maintenance on the company's main app, working on improvements and new features.
description.3: I improved the usability and mobile visual in various parts of the system.
description.4: I participated in integrations of external APIs for use in the app.
description.5: I constantly work on identifying and resolving technical problems and performance adjustments.
description.6: I have the pleasure of supporting the technical growth of the team, sharing knowledge and assisting fellow developers.

ifsc.description: During the course, I had the opportunity to learn from basic to technical English, dove into programming logic using Java, explored fundamental algorithm concepts, and took my first steps in web development.

senac.degree: Technology Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
senac.description: During the course, I had a deep immersion in software development, learning C#, React, React Native, and Database. Beyond technical skills, I developed an entrepreneurial and innovative vision, understanding business rules and good development practices. The intensive and immersive study environment allowed me to grow both as a developer and as a professional.
